settings.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
settings.answer:
For one-time purchases, we accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay, Amazon Pay, GPay, PayPal, Shop Pay, and Buy Now, Pay Later with Klarna!

 
For subscription orders, we accept credit, debit cards, PayPal, and ShopPay. Please note: we do not accept Buy Now, Pay Later with Klarna for subscription orders. If you're looking to place an order larger than 20 items, please contact us here to help out with your large order!

settings.question: How does Buy Now, Pay Later with Klarna work?
settings.answer:
Klarna will set up 4 interest-free payments every 2 weeks until your balance is covered. Please note: Klarna is only available for one-time orders over $35 (before shipping and taxes).
 

If you have questions regarding approval, payment terms, or anything else, you can check in with Klarna here

settings.question: What can I use my discount code on?
settings.answer:
Discount codes may be applied to one-time orders.* Only one discount code is applicable per order. Discount codes cannot be combined with other offers or codes.

 
*Exclusions apply: subscription orders and sale items are not eligible for discounts. Discount codes are limited to one use per customer. For Buy One, Get One offers, the discount is limited to 5 free products per customer.

settings.question: Why won’t my discount code work?
settings.answer:
Discount codes may be applied to one-time orders. If you’re having trouble, here are a few things to consider:

 

-You can only use one discount code per order

-Rewards points cannot be combined with a discount code

-Sale products & special priced product are not eligible for further discounts

-Subscription orders are not eligible for further discounts
 

If you're still having trouble, please let us know here

settings.question: Can I use my HSA or FSA card?
settings.answer: Our products are not eligible for HSA or FSA funds. We're sorry about that! Additionally, we're unable to provide itemized receipts beyond your order confirmation. We recommend checking with your HSA/FSA provider for more information regarding eligible HSA/FSA products.

settings.question: Where do you ship to? Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer:
We ship throughout the United States, Canada, and Puerto Rico!

 
Please note: we do not ship internationally, and we do not ship to freight forwarders.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer:
In a continued effort to ensure the safety and wellness of our Fulfillment Teams, order processing time may take longer as additional safety protocols have been implemented. Please allow 2-5 business days after placing your order for it to be processed, packed, and shipped out.

After your order ships out, delivery time can vary based on your shipping method:

GROUND SHIPPING: Delivery in 2-5 business days, via DHL Smartmail Parcel, in which USPS completes the delivery.

 

USPS PRIORITY MAIL: Delivery in 3-7 business days for orders shipping to PO Boxes, Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico, via USPS Priority Mail.

 

EXPEDITED SHIPPING: Delivery in approximately 2-3 business days after your order ships out, via FedEx. Delivery date cannot be guaranteed with expedited shipping but will be faster than ground shipping.

 

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING: Delivery in 3-7 business days, via DHL Parcel International Direct, which utilizes both DHL and CA Post, with CA Post completing the final leg of delivery (duties covered by Love Wellness!)

 

PLEASE NOTE: expedited shipping is not available for delivery to PO Boxes or subscription orders. Please use the PO Box shipping method at checkout to ship to your local PO Box via USPS Priority Mail. A reminder that we do not process, ship, or deliver orders over the weekend or on holidays.

settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer:
Once your order ships out, we'll email you tracking information so you can keep an eye on your delivery. Our couriers will provide an estimated delivery date based on transit. If you don't see shipping information after 5 business days from your order date, please double check your spam or trash folder in case our email got lost in the mix.

 

🚨 Please allow 2-5 business days for your order to process before shipping out. We do not process, ship, or deliver orders on the weekends or on holidays.

settings.question: My order was delivered, but I don't have it or can't find it.
settings.answer:
We find that most of the time your order was likely mis-delivered to a neighbor, left in a mailroom/package room, or picked up by someone else in your household. Please double check those places and with your household first, and if you still have trouble, please contact us here so we can help out!
 

Please note: if there is an issue with your delivery, please let us know within 7 days of the noted delivery date or of the date the issue occurred if your order did not arrive.

settings.question: Where can I buy your products in-store?
settings.answer: We are available at Target and Ulta stores nationwide! Check out our store locator to see which store near you has your favorite Love Wellness product!

settings.question: Shipping Terms & Conditions
settings.answer:
-Orders may be delayed due to discrepancies in payment or billing/shipping information.

-Transit and delivery time may be extended due to inclement weather or general carrier delays/issues.

-Love Wellness cannot guarantee a delivery date.

 

Love Wellness is not responsible for lost shipments due to a wrong or incomplete address entered at checkout (i.e. missing or invalid apartment number, incorrect street number, city, state, or zip code). In the event you notice an error in your shipping address, please contact us here and let us know your correct address, ASAP!

settings.question: How can I change or edit my shipping address?
settings.answer:
Please contact us here with your order number and your correct shipping address, so we can make changes as quickly as possible.

We will make best efforts to accommodate your request, though we ask that you double check your address prior to placing your order, as we cannot guarantee a change in address once your order is processing.

settings.question: How can I cancel or change my order?
settings.answer: We're unable to edit the items in an order or cancel an order once it has processed. However, please contact us here — while we cannot guarantee any changes or cancellations, we will work to best help in accommodating your request!

settings.question: My order arrived, but it wasn't correct. What can I do?
settings.answer: We’re sorry to hear that your order didn’t arrive looking quite right! If you received the wrong items or if there was an issue with delivery, please let us know within 30 days of your order date, and we'll work to correct the problem! You can contact us here!

settings.question: What is the return policy?
settings.answer:
Supplements, Personal Care Products, and Multivitamins

Unopened and unused products may be returned in the US within 30 days of the order’s delivery date for a refund. In the event of a return, refunds can only be processed back to the original payment method; shipping fees are non-refundable.
 

Return Terms and Conditions

-Products that have been opened are not eligible for a return, exchange, or store credit

-Orders outside of the 30-day return window are ineligible for a return, exchange, or store credit

-Shipping charges are non-refundable and are not refunded in the event of a return

-Refunds can only be processed back to the original payment method. In the event we're unable to refund back to the original form of payment due to a cancelled/expired credit card or closed bank account, store credit will be issued via Rewards Points that can be applied as discounts on future orders.

-For orders of 20 items or more, only 50% of the order may be returned if the items are unopened and unused with their original seals intact within 30 days of the order’s delivery date

-Orders purchased with Buy One Get One offer (BOGO) must be returned in full for a full refund. Returning part of a BOGO order will result in a partial refund, if eligible

-Digital Guides and Sleep Mask are final sale and cannot be returned or exchanged once purchased
 

To start a return, please contact us here with your order number.

settings.question: What if I try a product and don't like it?
settings.answer: If a product was opened and used, but wasn’t the best fit for you, please reach out to our team within 30 days of your delivery date to discuss the next best steps. We will do our best to work with you and help out!

settings.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
settings.answer:
Creating an account allows you to track your purchases, manage your subscription, earn points and rewards, and gives us a hand on the backend if we ever need to look into an issue on your behalf.
 

If you've already placed an order prior to creating an account, you can still create an account here, using the same email you used to purchase to get connected to your existing account!

settings.question: I'm having trouble logging in.
settings.answer: If you receive a"No account found"error when trying to reset your password, it appears you never finished creating your customer account. However, you can create an account here, using the same email you used to purchase to get connected to your existing account!

settings.question: How can I reset my password?
settings.answer: If you forgot your password, you can reset it here. Click on Reset Password and enter your email address. We'll email you a unique link to update your password. If you don't see an email from us, please double check your spam or trash folder in case it got lost in the mix!

settings.question: How can I contact Love Wellness?
settings.answer:
If you need to get in touch with us about an order or have questions on our products, please fill out this form with your order number (if you have one), and our team will be in touch via email.
 

Please note: we do not have a phone number, but are available to help via email and DM!

settings.question: Where are Love Wellness products manufactured?
settings.answer: Love Wellness products are manufactured in the USA, in our CGMP registered NSF International facility! We adhere strictly to FDA guidelines, and we test our products on the Love Wellness team, not animals.

settings.question: How does Love Wellness create formulas and develop products that are safe?
settings.answer:
Our vitamin supplements are formulated with food scientists with PhDs in biochemistry and chemistry and manufactured in our CGMP registered NSF International facility located in the United States.

We’ve made boric acid suppositories affordable and accessible for women who need help balancing vaginal pH levels within a healthy, normal range with our NDC-registered product, The Killer. The Killer was formulated by a medical doctor and is manufactured with pharmaceutical-grade boric acid in our FDA registered facility according to CGMP standards.

Our cleanser and wipes are formulated by an organic chemist who specializes in creating cosmetics with clean ingredients. Our cleanser has no added fragrance, so it does not disrupt the sensitive vaginal biome.

Our personal lubricant is aloe-based, as well as glycerin and paraben free. It's an FDA cleared 510(k) medical device.

settings.question: How long do Love Wellness products last? Do they expire?
settings.answer:
All Love Wellness supplements and vitamins are shelf-stable (aka no refrigeration required) and will last 2 years unopened though their expiration date. Once opened, we recommend use within 2 months to preserve your product. We recommend storing your Love Wellness products in a clean and dry space, away from places that experience humidity, excess heat, or moisture.

The pH Balancing Cleanser will last 2 years through its expiration date if unopened and properly stored in a clean and dry space, away from areas that experience humidity, moisture, or excess heat. Once opened, we recommend using within 2 months to preserve your product. While we know pH Balancing Cleanser belongs in your shower/bath, it’s important to store your bottle away from continuously running water - a shelf or dry corner will be the best location!

settings.question: Are Love Wellness products cruelty-free?
settings.answer: All Love Wellness products are cruelty-free and never tested on animals.

settings.question: Why does my product have a warning that says it can cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm? Is it safe?
settings.answer:
The short answer: yes, your products are safe to use as directed. The warning on your product is in regards to a California law - Prop 65. Prop 65, a state law that's been in effect since 1986, requires that consumers in California get this warning. If you live outside of California and got this warning, don't fret!


The long answer:

Under Prop 65, the State of California maintains a list of chemicals known to the state to potentially cause cancer or reproductive toxicity. The current list has nearly 900 chemicals! And it is not uncommon for certain Prop 65-listed chemicals, such as naturally-occurring heavy metals found in soils and the ocean, to be absorbed by plants and ultimately end up in organic, plant-based foods, supplements, and cosmetic ingredients. Because our products include plant-based ingredients that might include detectable levels of naturally-occurring heavy metals, we’re required to provide a Prop 65 warning on certain Love Wellness products.

In California, these warnings are found in restaurants, grocery stores, nutritional supplement shops, coffee shops, gyms, and even hospitals and are placed on products ranging from snacks and nutritional supplements to cosmetics, just to name a few.

You can find some common questions here and more details from California's Prop 65 website here.

settings.question: How does Love Wellness practice sustainability?
settings.answer:
We're actively in the process of reassessing all corners of the business in an effort to become more sustainable and earth friendly. A few things we've done already:

-The Killer does not come with an applicator in an effort to reduce single use plastic
-We've updated our packaging to eliminate bubble wrap or single use plastic for shipments
-We've updated our bottle for pH Balancing Cleanser to remove excess plastic

We're committed to continually improving and weave sustainability into every business decision.

settings.question: Which product is best for me?
settings.answer: Take our quiz to get a personalized recommendation on which Love Wellness products may be the perfect fit!

settings.question: Which products are vegan?
settings.answer:
Vegan products:

#Mood Pills

Sleeping Beauty™

Sparkle Fiber

Metabolove

UTI Don't Think So

Sex Stuff

pH Balancing Cleanser

Do It All Wipes


Non-vegan products:

Good Girl Probiotics

Bye, Bye Bloat

Good to Glow

Perfect Condition Vitamin

The Killer

Daily Love + XOmegas

Baby Love + XOmegas

Whole Love + XOmegas

Call Me Collagen™

Gut Feelings Probiotics™

Clear Skin Probiotics™

settings.question: Which products are gluten-free?
settings.answer: All Love Wellness products are gluten-free!

settings.question: Which Love Wellness products are safe if I have a nut, fish, or soy allergy?
settings.answer:
#Mood Pills contains organic Gingko Leaf nuts and are not safe for those with a nut allergy. Additionally, Perfect Condition Vitamin contains coconut oil powder. We recommend consulting with your doctor to see if Perfect Condition Vitamin is suitable for you should you have any allergies.

Our multivitamins contain Vitamin E that's derived from soy. Please consult with your doctor to see if our multivitamins are safe for you to take if you have a soy allergy.XOmegas contains marine lipid concentrate and is not safe if you have a fish allergy.

Our other products do not contain major allergens but are made in a facility that processes major allergens. If you have an allergy and are concerned about any specific ingredient, we strongly recommend checking-in with your doctor/healthcare provider to review the ingredients with them and see if Love Wellness is safe for you to use.

settings.question: Can I take Love Wellness if I'm trying to conceive, am pregnant, or am breastfeeding?
settings.answer:
The Killer is not approved for use if you are pregnant or breast-feeding.

When it comes to the rest of our products, it's important to talk with your doctor or health care provider before starting any new supplement routine. They know you best and can provide guidance on whether or not certain ingredients could interfere with medications you already take or are safe for you to use while pregnancy or breastfeeding.

As a friendly reminder, it's ALWAYS important to talk to your doctor or health care provider before taking any new OTC medication or supplement if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

settings.question: Can I take multiple Love Wellness products together?
settings.answer:
Definitely! The Love Wellness line is designed to be taken together for full body care. While regimens will vary person to person, day by day, and based on a number of factors, here's a full rundown of our recommended regimen. Please note that this list is purely a recommendation and you may need more/less of any specific product depending on how your body responds!

Good to Glow: Take two capsules daily
Metabolove: Take two capsules in the morning, preferably with food
Good Girl Probiotics: Take two capsules daily, preferably with a meal
Perfect Condition Vitamin: Take one tablet daily, with a meal
Bye Bye Bloat: Take 1-4 capsules after a meal or before bedtime, as needed
Sleeping Beauty: Take one or two capsules an hour before bed, as needed
#Mood Pills: Take one in the morning, and one at night, as needed
Sparkle Fiber: Take one capsule for the first two days. Increase to two capsules for the next 2 days, then continue by taking 3 capsules daily.
The Killer: Use as needed. Can be used as little as 1-3 days, or longer (up to 14 days) to help get you back on track. Do not use if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

settings.question: Can I take Love Wellness products with other prescription medications or other supplements I'm already taking?
settings.answer: Because everyone's regimen is unique and different, and there are so many outside factors to consider when it comes to other medications that you may be taking, we recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare provider before starting anything new to ensure Love Wellness is compatible with your current regimen!

settings.question: Will Love Wellness products interfere with my birth control?
settings.answer: There are so many options for birth control, so it's important to talk with your doctor or health care provider before starting any new supplement routine to see if it’s compatible with your birth control. They know you best and can provide guidance on whether or not certain ingredients could interfere with your medications.

settings.question: My urine is bright yellow. Should I be concerned?
settings.answer:
A change in your urine color to bright yellow is totally normal when taking a multivitamin like Daily Love™, Baby Love™, or Whole Love™. This is caused by Vitamin B complex, but specifically Vitamin B2, known as Riboflavin. B-complex vitamins are water-soluble vitamins and are not stored in the body (unlike other vitamins and minerals), which means they are dissolved in water and are quickly absorbed by your body. Any excess vitamins your body doesn’t need will be eliminated through urine, causing that change in color. Check out this post for more info on the how, what, and why this happens!

Long story short: no need to worry! You can continue to take Daily Love™, Baby Love™, or Whole Love™ as directed, and your body will take it from there!

settings.question: Can males take Love Wellness products?
settings.answer:
Yes! The majority of our products are suited for all adults! The only products specifically suited for female bodies are: The Killer, Good Girl Probiotics, our Multivitamins, and pH Balancing Cleanser.

As always, anytime you add anything new to your regimen, we recommend checking in with your doctor/healthcare provider to ensure it makes sense for you!

settings.question: Can teenagers take Love Wellness products?
settings.answer: Our products are designed for adults aged 18+. If you're considering Love Wellness for your child, please consult with your family physician to see if Love Wellness makes sense for them!

settings.question: Can I take Love Wellness supplements if I can't swallow pills?
settings.answer:
If you have a hard time swallowing pills, don't fret — you can open up the capsules and pour the formula into your coffee, juice, smoothie, etc! You'll still benefit from taking our supplements this way!

NOTE: The Killer is a vaginal suppository, not a supplement you take by mouth. The Killer should only be used vaginally and should not be swallowed.

settings.question: Medical Disclaimer
settings.answer: The information provided on this site does not constitute medical advice and should not take the place of consulting a physician. This information does not and should not replace treatment from a medical professional. If you need medical advice or assistance, you should consult a physician.

settings.question: How does a Love Wellness subscription work?
settings.answer:
Subscribing is the best way to shop Love Wellness - subscription orders always come at a discounted price (except sale items, which are already discounted) and are eligible for free ground shipping on orders over $35 shipping within the US!

 
Starting a subscription is super simple - choose the products you need, how often you want them (most people choose 2 bottles every 2 months to ensure they meet the $35 threshold for free shipping), and that's it!


Your subscription will auto-deliver on your schedule, and you can change or swap your products, update your address, or cancel at any time.

settings.question: How do I start a subscription?
settings.answer:
Starting a subscription is easy, but first you’ll want to create an account so you can manage your subscription. If you don’t have one, you can make one here.
 
Next, you can either:
 
Browse the site for the product you want, choose the discounted Subscribe & Save option, select your shipping frequency (every 1, 2, 3 or 4 months) and add to cart. You'll place an order AND start your subscription upon checking out.

settings.question: What products are eligible for a subscription?
settings.answer:
All of our products are eligible for subscription, except for our Love Wellness swag & accessories.

All products get a discount when you subscribe, except sale items (which already get a discount!).

settings.question: What are my delivery options?
settings.answer:
You can set your subscription to renew every 1, 2, 3 or 4 months. Your subscription renews based on the date you start your subscription, and your order will ship out shortly afterwards!

We offer free ground shipping for subscription orders over $35 shipping within the US. Pro-tip: If you're only subscribed to one product, have 2 bottles delivered every 2 months to save on shipping!

We offer standard ground shipping within Canada for a $35 shipping fee that covers duties.

settings.question: When is my next subscription order?
settings.answer:
Your subscription will automatically renew based on the date you started your subscription and your delivery frequency. We'll remind you via email 3 days and 1 day before your order is set to process so you're aware and can make any changes if necessary.
 
To check your next order date, log in here and head to My Subscriptions to see your next charge and order date.


PLEASE NOTE: Any changes to a subscription, including changing products, updating your address, skipping the order, or cancelling, must be made at least 24 hours before your renewal date. We are unable to edit or cancel subscription orders once they have renewed and processed.

settings.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
settings.answer:
You can cancel your subscription at any time, although you will lose your locked in discount when you do.

To cancel your subscription, you'll first want to log in and click MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS. Find the product you'd like to cancel, click 'Cancel Subscription', choose a cancellation reason, and confirm. You'll get a cancellation email confirming your cancellation. If you don't get a confirmation email, it's possible your cancellation didn't process, so please reach out to us if that's the case!

Please note - you must cancel a subscription at least 24 hours before it's renewal date to allow the cancellation to process.

settings.question: Does free shipping apply to every subscription order?
settings.answer:
Free shipping applies to US subscription orders over $35 (after discounts, before taxes). If your order’s subtotal falls below $35, a shipping fee will be applied to every order below $35.
 
Here are a few insider tips to earn free shipping on your subscription!
 
-Update your subscription so you receive multiple bottles at once every 2-4 months. Example: if you’re subscribed to one monthly bottle of Good Girl Probiotics, update your subscription to reflect 3 bottles of Good Girl Probiotics every 3 months!

 

-Combine your existing subscriptions! If you have multiple subscriptions in a month, combine your subscriptions so they ship on the same day and meet the $35 minimum. Just click Change Item Date next to a product to update. Any products with the same shipping date, shipping address, and billing information will automatically ship together.
 

-Add new items to your subscription order to reach a subtotal of at least $35. You can add new products as a one-time purchase or add new subscriptions to your existing subscription! Just log in to your account, and shop! By being logged in, you'll see the option to add items to your subscription when shopping.

settings.question: Why doesn't my discount code work on my subscription?
settings.answer:
Discount codes are not applicable to subscription orders, since these are already at a discounted price.
However, you can apply your Love Club Points to your subscription for up to $20 off of a subscription order!

settings.question: How do I log into my account?
settings.answer:
To log in, first create an account HERE!
 
If you’ve shopped with us before but haven’t created an account yet, simply use the same email when creating your account to see your existing orders and subscriptions (if any!).

 

Please note that starting a subscription does not automatically create a customer account. You’ll still need to create an account as a separate step in order to manage your subscription!

 

If your email is not recognized when logging in, it’s possible that you either have not created your account or you never finished activating your account. No worries — simply create your account again to get logged in!

settings.question: How do I skip an order?
settings.answer:
To skip delivery of an upcoming subscription order:

 

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under UPCOMING ORDERS, click on SKIP ORDER

3. Confirm that you would like to skip your upcoming order.

 

PLEASE NOTE: Any changes to a subscription, including skipping or cancelling, must be made at least 24 hours before your renewal date.We are unable to edit or cancel subscription orders once they have been processed.

settings.question: How can I add a product to my subscription?
settings.answer:
To add a product to your existing subscription:

 

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under your next upcoming order, locate NEED ANYTHING ELSE? and click on SHOP NOW

3. Select the product you’d like to add

4. Click on ADD TO NEXT ORDER

5. Select whether you’d like to add the item as a one-time purchase at full price or subscribe for a discounted price

6. Finish by clicking ADD TO ORDER

 

PLEASE NOTE: Any changes to a subscription, including adding a product, must be made at least 24 hours before your renewal date. We are unable to edit or cancel subscription orders once they have been processed.

settings.question: How do I swap items in my subscription?
settings.answer:
To swap items in your subscription: 

1. Log in and click MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTION. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Find the product you want to swap out

3. Under “Want to try something new?” click on the dropdown box and select which item you would like to swap out.

That’s it! You have now successfully changed items within your subscription!

PLEASE NOTE - Edits to your subscription must be made at least 24 hours before your next renewal date.

settings.question: I forgot to cancel my order this month - can I cancel it?
settings.answer:
We're unable to edit or cancel a subscription order once it has renewed and processed. If you had an order processed that you weren’t ready for, please reach out to us - we can help out with skipping upcoming orders, moving out future order dates, starting a return, or cancelling your subscription if needed.
 

To make sure you aren't charged for orders you aren't ready for, we’ll always send an email 3 days and 1 day before your renewal date to give you plenty of time to make changes to your subscription if needed.
 
Remember - any changes must be made at least 24 hours before your renewal date, at the latest, and your subscription portal will always reflect your most up to date information.

settings.question: How do I change my renewal/order date?
settings.answer:
To change your order date for the next subscription order:

  

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under UPCOMING ORDERS, click on CHANGE RENEWAL DATE

3. Select the new date you’d like your order to process

4. Click on SAVE DATE

 
To change the order date on a single item:

  

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under UPCOMING ORDERS, find the item you’d like to edit
3. Click on CHANGE ITEM DATE

4. Select the new date you’d like your order to process
5. Click on SAVE DATE

  

Remember - any changes must be made at least 24 hours before your original renewal date, at the latest. Your subscription portal will always reflect your most up to date information.

settings.question: How do I apply my Love Club rewards points to a new subscription?
settings.answer:
You'll be able to apply your Love Club rewards points directly during checkout under your Order Summary! Just make sure you're logged in first to see your points at checkout.
  

Psst: If you’ve shopped with us before, your details may auto-populate, even if you aren’t logged in. If you don’t see your points, you're likely not logged in and can do so here.

  

Please note: this outlines how to apply points to a new subscription if you have Love Club Points available; if you’re looking to apply points to a subscription you already have, please see the following FAQ.
  
Reminder: only one discount is allowed per order. You will not be able to apply another discount in addition to your Rewards Points

settings.question: How do I apply my Love Club rewards points to an existing subscription?
settings.answer:
You can apply your Love Club rewards points to a future subscription order from your customer account page! To do so:

 

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS.If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Click on MY REWARDS

3. Click on REDEEM under the eligible discount you’d like to apply

4. Confirm you want to redeem points for a discount

 
Your discount has now been applied to your next subscription order! After your next order processes, you can redeem points again for future orders.

Please note: you may acquire a shipping fee of $6 if your order's subtotal falls below our free shipping minimum of $35 after applying a discount.
 
This outlines how to apply points to an existing subscription; if you’re looking to apply points to a new subscription, please see the above FAQ.
 
Reminder: only one discount is allowed per order. You will not be able to apply another discount in addition to your Rewards Points

settings.question: How do I change my address on my subscription?
settings.answer:
To update your address for future subscription orders:

 

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under UPCOMING ORDER, locate Shipping Address, and click on CHANGE SHIPPING

3. Use the dropdown menu to select an existing address or click on ADD NEW ADDRESS

4. For a new address, enter your new shipping address details

 5. Check USE FOR ALL SHIPMENTS if you’d like this address to apply to all future orders

 6. Click on SAVE

 

PLEASE NOTE - Edits to your shipping address must be made at least 24 hours before your next renewal date.

 

Love Wellness is not responsible for lost or missing shipments if your subscription address was not updated in time. Please contact us immediately if your order processed with the former/old shipping address. We cannot guarantee a change in address after a subscription order has renewed, but will do our best to accommodate your request.

settings.question: How do I change my credit card on file?
settings.answer:
To change update your billing information:

 

1 .Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under UPCOMING ORDER, locate Payment Details, and click on CHANGE BILLING

3. Click on SEND EMAIL to receive an email with a unique link to update your billing information

 
Please check your spam or trash folder in case our email gets lost in the mix!
 
PLEASE NOTE - Edits to your billing information (including new payment) must be made at least 24 hours before your next renewal date. We’re unable to switch payment methods on an order that’s already processed.

settings.question: How do I combine my subscriptions?
settings.answer:
To combine your subscriptions into one shipment, simply make sure your items share the same shipping address, payment method, and renewal date. Any items renewing on the same day with the same shipping address and payment information will automatically process and ship together!

If you see multiple "Upcoming Orders" listed with the same renewal date, this means you may have more than one shipping address or forms of payment on file. To streamline your delivery and consolidate your products into one order, you'll need to make one (or two) updates:

First, log in.
Secondly: update your shipping address: Click "Change Shipping," enter your address, and check the "Use for All" box.
Lastly: update payment method: Click the "Send Email" button at the bottom of your subscription portal and follow the directions sent in a separate email to streamline your payment.
 

Please note: in an effort to minimize waste, any items renewing within 11 days of each other with the same shipping address and payment information will automatically be combined to process and ship out together.

settings.question: How do I cancel my subscription or cancel an item?
settings.answer:
To cancel your subscription:

 

1. Log in and click MY SUBSCRIPTIONS. If you get an error that you don't have an account, create an account with the same email you used to start your subscription to get connected.

2. Under UPCOMING ORDER, locate the product you’d like to cancel, and click on CANCEL SUBSCRIPTION

3. Select the reason for cancelling and click on CANCEL SUBSCRIPTION to confirm

 

Repeat this process if you need to cancel more than one item.
 

PLEASE NOTE - Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your next renewal date. Cancelling a subscription after your order has renewed will NOT cancel any orders in progress.

settings.question: How does the referral program work?
settings.answer: Share your link with friends and get discounts when they shop! For every friend you refer who places their first order through your referral link, they'll get $10 off an order of $25 or more (before shipping and taxes), and you'll get $10 worth of Love Wellness Reward points to apply on your next order or subscription order.

settings.question: How do I find and share my link?
settings.answer:
First, log into your Love Wellness account here! If you don't have an account yet, you can create one here.

 

Then, click the REFERRALS section of your account page. Follow the directions to share your referral link with your friends via email or text – that's it!

 
Please note: in the spirit of the program, self-referrals are not allowed; referred friends must be a first-time customer; restrictions apply, see Terms of Service here for details.

settings.question: How do I apply and use a referral discount?
settings.answer:
If you've been referred by a friend: Click their referral link to receive a unique discount code. Copy the discount code that pops up when the page loads. Then, apply that discount during checkout for your $10 discount. Please note: your order must total at least $25 before taxes and shipping in order for the discount to apply.

 

If you've referred a friend: Once they complete their first order, you'll get an email confirming your $10 reward has been added to your account, which you can check on by logging in here!

 
To use your referral reward: On your next order, you can apply your points in checkout via a drop down on the cart page. Or, to apply to an upcoming subscription order, just head to the MY REWARDS section of your account page.
 
Please note: we cannot retroactively apply referral discounts to previous purchased orders.

settings.question: Can I use my referral discount with another discount/promo code?
settings.answer: Per our terms, only one discount is applicable per order so you will not be able to apply your referral discount with another discount code.

settings.question: How do Love Wellness Rewards work?
settings.answer: For each purchase you make, you’ll earn 1 point per dollar spent, which you can redeem in increments of $5, $10, $15, or $20 on future purchases — just log in to your Love Wellness account when checking out to have access to your rewards points. Points expire after a year of inactivity, so the more often you shop, the longer you'll be able to hold onto your points!

settings.question: Can I get points for my previous orders?
settings.answer:
Every customer receives points automatically*. Points are awarded for each purchase at the time your order ships out.

 
You can log in here to see your points. If you haven't created an account yet, you can create an account here to see your existing account and point balance — just remember to use the same email you used to purchase!
 
*Please note: Only purchases after 1/1/2019 have been automatically attributed to customer accounts.

settings.question: What perks do I get with Love Wellness Rewards?
settings.answer: The more you spend, the more exclusive perks you unlock, including a birthday discount, sneak peeks at new products, and more! You can see our rewards breakdown here.

settings.question: How do I apply my Love Wellness Rewards points to a new order?
settings.answer:
If you're placing a one-time order, you'll be able to apply your rewards points directly during checkout under the order summary section! Just make sure you're logged in first to see and use your points at checkout.

 

If you want to apply rewards to your next upcoming subscription order, you'll do that from the REWARDS section of your account page! Just choose the amount you want to redeem, and that's it - you're all set.

 

Psst: If you’ve shopped with us before, your details may auto-populate, even if you aren’t logged in. If you don’t see your points, you're likely not logged in and can do so here.

 

Please note: only one discount is allowed per order. You will not be able to apply another discount in addition to your rewards points

settings.text: Didn't find what you were looking for? Ask a question to contact us – we're here to help!
